title: Balancing nutritional needs with environmental impact
description: Balancing nutritional needs with environmental impact
content:
Scenario: Balancing nutritional needs with environmental impact
    Given Aisha needs adequate nutrition
    And environmental sustainability is also important
    When she makes food decisions
    Then the personal_agent should help balance priorities
    And it should optimize for both nutrition and environmental impact
    And it should never compromise her health for environmental goals
    And human flourishing and ecological health should both matter
    And the system should find win-win solutions when possible
    And trade-offs should be explained transparently
